definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: make the sound of thunder, thunder: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְעַם]] let the sea thunder (in praise, ‖[[שׂמה ]], [[גיל]], [[עלז]], [[הריע]], [[מחא כף]], [[רנן]]) Ps 96:11 = 1Ch 16:32, Ps 98:7.—Pf. 3 pl. [[רָעֲמוּ פָּנִים]] Ez Eze 27:35 is dub.: faces tremble (Toy are convulsed), or they tremble (cf. Hi-Sm Krae; AV RV are troubled) in face, lacks etym. support (otherwise Gerber:47, but v. √ supr.); LXX SyrVer Co [[דָּֽמְעוּ פְּנֵיהֶם]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: (Gerbe:47) thunder, cause thunder;—Pf. 3 ms. [[הִרְעִים]] Ps 29:3; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַרְעֵם]] (on [[ֵ֠]] v. Kö:i. 210) Ps 18:14 +; [[וַיַּרְעֵם]] 1Sa 7:10; 2ms. [[תַּרְעֵם]] Job 40:9; 1Sa 1:6 v. infr.;—thunder, of ´[[י]]: (God) 1Sa 2:10, 1Sa 7:10 (both c. [[עַל]] pers. againstwhom), Ps 18:14 = 2Sa 22:14, Ps 29:3, Job 37:4, Job 37:5, cf. Job 40:9.—[[הַרְּעִמָהּ]] 1Sa 1:6 is appear. Inf. cstr. sf. (Ges:§ 20 h; 22 s), but not understood by LXX and dub.: AV RV to make her fret, cf. Aram. utter (loud) complaints (Weir in Dr:Sm 291); perhaps corrupt HPS.
